page.title: 03ATTITUDES IN N.BRISTOL
page.content: Varied attitudes reflect{social {divisions.}Contrast in attitudes of predominately middle class areas with those living on large council estate where high{unemployment}gives rise to more negative &/or agressive attitudes. People in wealthier areas tend to fear criminal acts such as vandalism, mugging, burglary,car theft due to close proximity of a poor area where the{crime rate}is high.They also have different attitudes and anxieties due to higher social expectations, in housing,school successes,holidays of prestige value.A good community spirit exists in parts of the area.Many remain in Southmead, using only local amenities,some children having never visited nearby Bristol city centre. Attitudes tend to be narrow & less liberal.Intolerance of minorities, particularly gypsies camping nearby.
